name: layerswitcher

params.description: position of component into the map, 'topleft' by default
params.name: options.position

params.description: list of layers to be configured. Each array element is an object, with following properties :
params.name: options.layers

params.description: display layer in widget layer list
params.name: options.layers.display

params.description: layer alias, to be displayed in widget layer list. E.g. : "Cartes IGN"
params.name: options.layers.config.title

params.description: layer description, to be displayed on title hover, or in layer information panel.
params.name: options.layers.config.description

params.description: link to a quick look image for this layer.
params.name: options.layers.config.quicklookUrl

params.description:
array of layer legends. Each array element is an object, with following properties :
     - url (String, mandatory) : link to a legend
     - minScaleDenominator (Number, optional) : min scale denominator for legend validity.
params.name: options.layers.config.legends

params.description: array of layer metadata. Each array element is an object, with property url (String, mandatory) : link to a metadata
params.name: options.layers.config.metadata
